query: How do I enable or disable mobile bands on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Enable Bands, then select the band type you want to toggle (2G, 3G, 4G, etc.) and enable or disable it.

query: How do I turn off or on wifi?

It's color will change to disabled/off. The second way is to go to Settings > Wi-Fi and toggle on/off the the Wi-Fi.

query: How do I open the Settings app on FuriOS?
response: You can open Settings by tapping the Settings icon in your app drawer, or by swiping down from the top of the screen to open the Quick Settings panel and tapping the gear icon.

query: How do I connect to a Wi-Fi network on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi. Make sure Wi-Fi is enabled (toggle on). Available networks will appear under Visible Networks. Tap the network you want to connect to and enter the password if required.

query: How do I view my saved Wi-Fi networks?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Saved Networks. A popup will appear showing all your previously connected Wi-Fi networks. From here you can see and manage your saved connections.

query: How do I forget or remove a saved Wi-Fi network?
keyword: forget wifi, remove wifi, delete saved network
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap the connected or saved network to open its details, scroll down and tap Forget Connection... to remove it from your saved networks.

query: How do I connect to a hidden Wi-Fi network?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap Connect to Hidden Network.... In the popup, select your Wi-Fi adapter, enter the Network name, choose the Wi-Fi security type (None, WPA, WPA2, etc.), enter the password if needed, and tap Connect.

query: How do I turn on Wi-Fi hotspot on FuriOS?
keyword: wifi hotspot, hotspot, tethering, share internet, mobile hotspot

query: How do I change my Wi-Fi hotspot name and password?

query: How do I turn off Wi-Fi hotspot?

query: How do others connect to my Wi-Fi hotspot?
keyword: connect to hotspot, join hotspot, scan qr hotspot
response: When your hotspot is active, a QR code is displayed on the Settings > Wi-Fi screen. Other devices can scan this QR code to automatically connect, or they can manually search for your hotspot name and enter the password.

query: How do I enable Airplane Mode on FuriOS?
keyword: airplane mode, flight mode, disable mobile broadband
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and toggle on Airplane Mode. This disables mobile broadband. You can also access Airplane Mode from the Quick Settings by swiping down from the top of the screen.

query: How do I view Wi-Fi network details on FuriOS?
keyword: wifi details, network info, wifi information, ip address
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi and tap on a connected network. The Details tab shows: Signal Strength, Security type, IPv4 Address, IPv6 Address, Hardware Address (MAC), Supported Frequencies (2.4 GHz/5 GHz), Default Route, and DNS.

query: How do I find my IP address on FuriOS?
keyword: ip address, ipv4, ipv6, network address
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and view the Details tab. Your IPv4 Address and IPv6 Address are displayed there along with the Default Route and DNS settings.

query: How do I find my MAC address on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and view the Details tab. Your Hardware Address (MAC address) is displayed there.

query: How do I set a Wi-Fi connection to connect automatically?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on your connected network, and in the Details tab, enable the Connect automatically checkbox. The device will automatically connect to this network when in range.

query: How do I share a Wi-Fi connection with other users on FuriOS?
keyword: share wifi, wifi other users, multi user wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and in the Details tab, enable Make available to other users. This allows other user accounts on the device to use this saved connection.

query: How do I set a Wi-Fi network as metered on FuriOS?
keyword: metered connection, data limit, metered wifi
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and in the Details tab, enable Metered connection. This indicates the connection has data limits or can incur charges. Software updates and large downloads will not start automatically on metered connections.

query: How do I view or change Wi-Fi identity settings?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the Identity tab. Here you can view and configure: BSSID, MAC Address, and Cloned Address settings.

query: How do I configure a static IP address on Wi-Fi?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 tab, and change IPv4 Method from Automatic (DHCP) to Manual. Then enter your desired Address, Netmask, DNS, and Routes.

query: What IPv4 methods are available for Wi-Fi on FuriOS?
keyword: ipv4 methods, dhcp, manual ip, shared
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the IPv4 tab. Available methods are: Automatic (DHCP) - gets IP automatically, Manual - set static IP, and Shared to other computers - share connection.

query: How do I set custom DNS servers for Wi-Fi?
keyword: custom dns, change dns, dns settings
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 or IPv6 tab. In the DNS field, enter your preferred DNS server addresses. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas.

query: How do I configure IPv6 settings on Wi-Fi?
keyword: ipv6 settings, ipv6 configure, ipv6 manual
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the IPv6 tab. Choose your method: Automatic, Automatic, DHCP, Link-Local Only, Manual, Shared to other devices, or Disable.

query: What IPv6 methods are available for Wi-Fi on FuriOS?
keyword: ipv6 methods, ipv6 options, ipv6 modes
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi > [Network] > IPv6. Methods include: Automatic, Automatic, DHCP, Link-Local Only, Manual (enter Address, Prefix, Gateway), Shared to other devices, and Disable (turn off IPv6).

query: How do I disable IPv6 on FuriOS?
keyword: disable ipv6, turn off ipv6, ipv6 off
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv6 tab, and set IPv6 Method to Disable. Tap Apply to save the changes.

query: How do I only use a Wi-Fi connection for its own network resources?
keyword: network only, local resources, no default route
response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, select the IPv4 or IPv6 tab, and enable Use this connection only for resources on its network. This prevents the connection from becoming your default route.

query: How do I view or change Wi-Fi security settings?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on a network, and select the Security tab. Here you can see the security type (e.g., WPA & WPA2 Personal) and update the password. Toggle Show password to reveal the current password.

query: How do I change my saved Wi-Fi password?

response: Go to Settings > Wi-Fi, tap on the saved network, select the Security tab, enter the new password in the Password field, and tap Apply to save.

query: How do I access Quick Settings on FuriOS?

response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open the Quick Settings panel. Here you can toggle Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Torch, Hotspot, and view notifications. Swipe down again to expand for more options.

query: How do I turn on the flashlight/torch on FuriOS?
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open Quick Settings, then tap the Torch icon to turn on the flashlight. Tap it again to turn it off.

query: How do I clear notifications on FuriOS?

response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open the notification panel. Tap Clear all at the top right to dismiss all notifications at once. You can also swipe individual notifications left or right to dismiss them.

query: How do I quickly toggle Hotspot from the notification panel?
keyword: quick hotspot, toggle hotspot, hotspot shortcut
response: Swipe down from the top of the screen to open Quick Settings. Tap the Hotspot icon to quickly toggle it on or off without going into Settings.

query: What quick toggles are available in FuriOS notification panel?
keyword: quick toggles, notification toggles, quick access
response: The Quick Settings panel (swipe down from top) includes toggles for: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Torch (flashlight), Hotspot, and shows the current date and battery percentage.

query: Where are screenshots saved on FuriOS?

query: What tabs are available when viewing Wi-Fi network settings?

response: When you tap on a Wi-Fi network in Settings, you can access these tabs: Details (connection info), Identity (BSSID, MAC), IPv4 (IP configuration), IPv6 (IPv6 configuration), and Security (password and encryption).

query: How do I access Network settings on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Network. Here you can configure VPN connections and Proxy settings.

query: How do I set up a VPN on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN and tap the + button. Choose your VPN type: L2TP, OpenVPN, PPTP, SSTP, Cisco Compatible (vpnc), or WireGuard. You can also import a VPN configuration from a file.

query: What VPN types are supported on FuriOS?
keyword: vpn types, vpn protocols, vpn options
response: FuriOS supports: L2TP (Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol), OpenVPN, PPTP (Point-to-Point Tunneling), SSTP (Secure Socket Tunneling), Cisco Compatible VPN (vpnc), and WireGuard. You can also import VPN configurations from a file.

query: How do I set up WireGuard VPN on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN, tap +, and select WireGuard. Enter the Connection Name, Interface Name, Private Key, Listen Port (default 51820), and configure your Peers. You can also set MTU and fwmark values.

query: How do I configure a network proxy on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Network > Proxy. Enable Network Proxy and set the Configuration to Automatic. Enter the Configuration URL for your proxy server.

query: How do I import a VPN configuration file?
keyword: import vpn, vpn file, vpn config file
response: Go to Settings > Network > VPN, tap +, and select Import from file... to import an existing VPN configuration file.

query: How do I access Mobile Network settings?

query: How do I enable data roaming on FuriOS?

query: How do I configure MMS settings on FuriOS?

query: How do I lock my SIM card with a PIN?

response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > SIM Lock and toggle on Lock SIM with PIN. You'll need to enter a PIN that will be required each time the device starts.

query: How do I view modem details on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Mobile Network > Modem Details. This shows Carrier, Network Type (e.g., LTE), Signal Strength, Network Status, IMS Registration, Voice/SMS capability, Manufacturer, Model, Firmware Version, and IMEI.

query: How do I select a mobile network manually?

query: How do I connect a Bluetooth device to FuriOS?

query: How do I change power mode on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the accent color on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the wallpaper on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Appearance and tap + Add Picture... under Background to select a custom wallpaper image.

query: How do I view installed apps on FuriOS?

query: How do I set default apps on FuriOS?

query: How do I hide an app from the app grid on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable Do Not Disturb on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Sharing. Enable Media Sharing to stream music, photos, and videos to devices on your current network.

response: Go to Settings > Sharing and edit the Device Name field to change how your device appears on the network.

query: How do I change the primary mouse button on FuriOS?

query: How do I view keyboard shortcuts on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > Keyboard > View and Customize Shortcuts. Categories include: Accessibility, Launchers, Navigation, Screenshots, Sound and Media, System, Typing, and Windows.

query: How do I configure the Assistant button on FuriOS?

response: The Assistant button supports: No Action (Disable), Toggle flashlight, Open camera, Take picture, Take screenshot, Send Tab key, Manual autorotation, Send Back key, and Send Escape key.

query: How do I start the Android container on FuriOS?

query: How do I share files between Linux and Android on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Android and enable Shared Folder to enable file sharing between the Linux host and Android guest.

query: How do I see which Android apps are installed on FuriOS?

query: How do I wipe Android data on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the USB mode on FuriOS?

query: What is RNDIS mode on FuriOS?

query: What is USB CD-ROM mode on FuriOS?

response: CD-ROM mode makes your phone appear as a virtual CD-ROM drive to the computer. Enable at Settings > USB and select a CD-ROM image file.

query: How do I configure GPS on FuriOS?
response: Go to Settings > GPS. You can configure the SUPL Server for assisted GPS. The default is supl.google.com.

query: How do I encrypt my device on FuriOS?

query: How do I add a printer on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable the screen reader on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable high contrast mode on FuriOS?

query: How do I make text larger on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the cursor size on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable visual alerts for sounds on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable sticky keys on FuriOS?

response: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Typing and enable Sticky Keys to treat modifier key sequences as key combinations.

query: What accessibility options are available on FuriOS?

query: How do I set a screen lock on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable location services on FuriOS?

query: How do I clear file history on FuriOS?

query: How do I disable the camera on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the region or language on FuriOS?

query: How do I change the date and time on FuriOS?

query: How do I enable SSH on FuriOS?

query: How do I check what version of FuriOS I have?

query: How do I add a user on FuriOS?

query: What is Mobile Settings on FuriOS?
